extension.name: OPC Tracking - Custom Code
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Custom code, for order or user specific variables, use template variables from Available Vars tab, for example {bt_virtuemart_order_id} will be changed upon executing of the code to the specific order ID of the order.

param.name: code
param.label: Your custom code
param.description: Your custom code (replace variables as needed)
